## ExpressionFunctionDefinitions interface

A mapping of `ExpressionFunctionDefinition`<!-- -->s for functions which the Expressions services provides out-of-the-box. Any new functions registered by the Expressions plugin should have their types added here.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExpressionFunctionDefinitions 
```
